mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.user_id, r.movie_id, r.rating, r.review_comment, r.created_at AS reviewCreatedAt, m.title AS movie_title FROM reviews r JOIN movies m ON r.movie_id = m.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (movie_id, user_id, rating, review_comment, created_at) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{userId}, #{rating}, #{reviewComment}, SYSDATE)
